TopicTitle: Kerbin Cup Unofficial Team Entries - On hold

Articles.Content: 'Kenbobo5588' is now a member of 'Team Uzuro'
I suppose we'll take Mareczex333.... Dude might come in handy if we have to build a rally car, or the prettiest plane humanly possible

I'm surprised at the relatively small number of contending teams!

Also, Team I Think We Broke It is first on the list. Does that mean we were the first to submit our team? If so, awesome!
sdj64 is now part of Team Jedi, and it is fully assembled!
The deadline for team submissions to Rowsdower is in just over 5h, I think that if we want to do any voting on teams else than letting he choose the 4 himself, we need to start voting soon.
Crotchety old moderators was the first team out the door. What is there only 10 teams?

I really hate that there are at least six teams that won't get to do ANYTHING. I don't intend to be among them.

Vote Team Jedi! We have all the cookies!

Hey you!

You better pick A-team!

Know why?

Cause otherwise you'll NEVER see the rest of these videos!

Yea? My video doesn't have any KSP in it. So What? Screw flying, I don't need it to turn the competition into paste.

Ok, maybe my computer just isn't smart enough to play and record KSP at the same time, but but that ain't your problem.

What is your problem is what team you pick. And you are going to pick The A-Team.

Go forums!

Edited June 15, 2014 by Pbhead
OK, Team Jedi needs a cool poster or trailer or something. Hold on...
Tw1 took the original screenshot, I just added the text.

Team clown_baby

So we don't have a team name or a cool video. But my 3 team builders are fantastic at building and I'm not too shabby myself. I'm sure you've seen some of our work, and we could do a hell of a job representing the fourm.

So ya know, vote for us. Team clown_baby(for now)

Cupcake...

Parallax

Mareczex333

and your's truly

Edited June 16, 2014 by clown_baby

Argh! I only found out about this now. Got nobody to blame but myself. I've been invited to a team on Reddit, which I accepted, but was asked yesterday. So in case that team no longer has room, I thought I'd announce my interest here, just in case there is still a team with a spot open.

Argh! I only found out about this now. Got nobody to blame but myself. I've been invited to a team on Reddit, which I accepted, but was asked yesterday. So in case that team no longer has room, I thought I'd announce my interest here, just in case there is still a team with a spot open.

Uzuro has a place I thin.

Edited June 15, 2014 by Spartwo

It's only a few hours left..., There's no real time to do a poll without it being fair. Maybe this time (the first), we should let Rowsdower pick the teams!

Or give us a few days to vote!

What Clown_baby said seems good too, problem is..., the teams may not be able to talk or even vote before 8pm CDT!

such a hurry -.-!

Indeed. I'm not sure what action to take at this point to help select the 'four.' I'm the type that loves to see everyone join in and have fun!
no one has had a chance to submit anything, on what basis are teams already being disqualified?

As the main thread says, we're suppose to pick 4..., which ones to pick?, I don't know, I guess the only way is to choose for the members.., maybe advertising? That's why we did the poster and the video (and for the fun, of course)

Anyway, I'm talking to Xacktar now and if we don't get picked, we will be doing unofficial releases in our way, even if we can't win... will be super funny
If I fail to make it to a team, may I *please* compete as a solo? Cutoff looms and the 'Whack is gettin' desperate!

If I fail to make it to a team, may I *please* compete as a solo? Cutoff looms and the 'Whack is gettin' desperate!

I'm quite surprised nobody's took you on quite yet!

If he had shown up earlier people would be fighting each other for him. But nearly all the teams are full now.

Until we have a proper production set. Vote Hype Train or else you'll have 3 militarists to deal with when KMP kicks in(KIDDING!, please don't hate us 0_O)
